post.description: Authenticate admin and receive access token
Get new access token using refresh token

delete.description: Delete an admin account. Only available to supervisors.

403.description: Forbidden - Only supervisors can delete admins

patch.summary: Update admin role and permissions (Supervisor only)
patch.description: Update an admin's role and permissions. Only available to supervisors.

400.description: Cannot change own role or invalid role value

403.description: Forbidden - Only supervisors can update roles or Cannot change supervisor role

get.description: Retrieve a list of all admins with their roles. Only available to supervisors.

403.description: Forbidden - Only supervisors can view all admins

403.description: Forbidden - Only supervisors can view all admins

patch.description: Update an admin's status (active/inactive). Only available to supervisors.

403.description: Forbidden - Only supervisors can update admin status

patch.description: Reset an admin's password. Only available to supervisors.

400.description: Invalid password - Must be at least 6 characters long

403.description: Forbidden - Only supervisors can reset passwords or Cannot reset another supervisor's password

post.description: Send a one-time password (OTP) code to the admin's email for password reset verification
Reset admin password using the OTP code sent to their email

400.description: Invalid OTP, expired OTP, or password too short

post.description: Reset an admin's password by sending a new random password to their email

200.description: Password reset successfully and email sent
